Player History
Drafted in 15th round, 236th overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2015, off Jeffrey Horne (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/1/2015, off Jeffrey Horne (SF)...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/2/2016 to a 2-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Cincinnati on 3/2/2017 (Going to CIN: SS Andrew Sharma. Going to SLB: P Richard Olson)...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (C) on 9/8/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/5/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/10/2019, hitting .414 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
